text: The Bloody Money (Turkish: Kanlı Para) is a 1953 Turkish adventure film directed by Orhon M. Ariburnu and starring Ayhan Isik and Nedret Güvenç.Scognamillo & Demirhan p.315 ==Cast== * Ayhan Isik * Nedret Güvenç * Orhon M. Ariburnu * Aliye Rona * Lale Oraloglu * Refik Kemal Arduman * Tevhid Bilge * Adil Güldürür * Hüseyin Kemal Gürmen * Muharrem Gürses * Atif Kaptan * Sadri Karan * Mücap Ofluoglu * Necmi Oy * Salih Tozan * Kadri Ögelman ==References== ==Bibliography== * Giovanni Scognamillo & Metin Demirhan. Fantastik Türk sineması. Kabalcı Yayınevi, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 adventure films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish adventure films
title: The Bloody Money
